title: 登陆插件报错
author: AJ_
txt_content:
登陆插件报错，玩家登陆不了


[15:22:38 WARN]: [AuthMeMYSQLPool housekeeper] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.zaxxer.
hikari.pool.HikariPool - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Thread starvation or clock leap detec
ted (housekeeper delta=1m12s966ms655?s320ns).

replies.author: AJ_
replies.txt_content: 我用的是数据库连接的 authme 插件

replies.author: AJ_
replies.txt_content: 实在是不知道什么原因，求大神帮助

replies.author: Eiup_Niow
replies.txt_content: 你连接的是外部数据库么?请使用本机的数据库

replies.author: dengyu
replies.txt_content: 你设置mysql数据库了嘛，没有的话就设置它
